Enter Division No. or (ALL) Text PPDField01 1 3 R Enter a valid division # or (ALL)
Enter Report Type (R),(M),(U) or (ALL) DropDown PPDField02 1 3 R Enter (R)egular, (M)anual, (U)nits of Production or (ALL) H R,M,U,ALL R,M,U,ALL
Enter Starting Depr. Period (YYYYMM) Text PPDField03 3 6 R Enter starting depreceiation period (Ex. 200202)
Enter No. of Years to Depreciate Text PPDField04 3 2 R
Enter No. of Periods to Depreciate Text PPDField05 3 2 R Enter the number of periods to depriciate. Minimum is zero.ýMaximum is number of periods still open in the current year.ýMaximum is (number of periods in a year + 1 - current period)
